pages.text: $(d)Imbues$() can be crafted in the $(l:blocks/imbuing_station)Imbuing Station$(/l) and act similarly to potions.$(br2)When you drink an Imbue, you will be given a unique buff for $(3)20 minutes$(). However, you can $(c)only have one Imbue effect at a time$().
pages.title: Imbues

pages.text: The $(d)Fire Imbue$() will light your opponent on fire when you strike them.
The $(d)Poison Imbue$() will inflict Poison II on your opponent when you strike them.
The $(d)Wither Imbue$() will inflict Wither II on your opponent when you strike them.
The $(d)Experience Imbue$() will increase the experience dropped by slain mobs by 50%.
The $(d)Spectre Imbue$() will give you a $(3)chance to completely negate incoming damage$().$(br2)The default chance is 10%, but this can be configured.

The $(d)Collapse Imbue$() will inflict the Collapse effect on your opponent when you strike them.$(br2)For players, the Collapse effect inverts their movement and mouse controls.$(br2)For mobs, it confuses their pathfinding, causing them to move erratically.
